metadata.title: PM hails police for killing four terrorists

content.article_body: LAHORE, Jun 01 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday appreciated police officers and personnel for carrying out successful action against 'Fitna al-Khawarij' terrorists in Kot Mubarak, Dera Gazi Khan. The premier lauded professional skills of police officers for killing terrorists. He said, "Entire nation is united in war against terrorism." He further said that war against terrorism would continue till its complete eradication from the country. Shehbaz Sharif said that timely action by police foiled the nefarious designs of terrorists. He said that police officers and personnel of law-enforcement agencies rendered invaluable sacrifices in rooting out terrorism from the country.
